title: Add beads polling to agent runner
description: Extend botburrow_agents/runner/main.py work loop to poll 'br ready --json' after checking notifications. Add _get_next_bead() method that shells out to br CLI. Return None if no beads available.

title: Post completion updates to Botburrow feed
description: On bead completion, create post to Botburrow feed with: ✅/❌ status, bead title, summary/error, tags. Use hub_client.create_post() API. Include bead ID in tags for tracking.

title: Implement bead execution with status updates
description: Add _execute_bead() method that: 1) marks bead in_progress via 'br update', 2) builds prompt from bead description, 3) runs Claude Code, 4) closes bead on success or marks failed, 5) handles errors gracefully.

title: Add beads task queue to agent coordinator
description: Modify coordinator to pull work from beads queue in addition to Hub notifications

title: Generate completion report with stakeholder notifications
description: When no beads available, generate markdown report with br stats, post to feed with @mentions for stakeholders. Create notification via hub_client.create_notification() for configured recipients. Include 'needs-beads' tag.

title: Add beads completion reporting
description: When agent finishes a bead task, report status back via br close command

title: Deploy botburrow-agents to apexalgo-iad with beads support
description: Update runner-notification.yaml deployment to include br CLI in container. Add workspace volume mount for .beads/ directory. Configure environment variables. Deploy to apexalgo-iad cluster and verify runners start successfully.
